question:
Your friend has a baby recently and you bought a present for baby.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:Describe what you bought?Why you choose the present?Suggest some arrangements to visit your friend to bring the present.
text: I am writing this letter to congrats your child’s birth and I hope you and your kid be in a good health. It was great news when I heard that your lovely girl was finally born.

In fact, I decided to be the first one who celebrates with you this special occasion and I already bought a very useful carrier as a gift for your baby. Also, I purchased it online and selected specified options that fit with newborn babies.

Actually, I purchased this present because it will help you in carrying your little angel while you are going outside or cooking. In addition, it will be useful for your husband to take care of the girl whenever she cries and you are tired.
Finally, I am very excited to visit you and see your cute little princess. However, I am free this weekend, so please let me know if you are available or shall delay my coming.
